cyclone.name: IAN
cyclone.current_location: about 430 mi ESE of Kingston, Jamaica
cyclone.trajectory: expected to move west tonight, then turn northwest and north-northwest Sunday–Monday toward the Cayman Islands, western Cuba, and eventually the eastern Gulf of Mexico/Florida peninsula
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Florida west-central coast (around the Tampa Bay area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch for the Cayman Islands; Tropical Storm Watch for Jamaica
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central Caribbean Sea, Cayman Islands, western Cuba and Florida peninsula within 5-day cone
weather_observation.wind: Only a very slight (≈3%) chance of 34-kt winds late in the 5-day period; otherwise breezy conditions.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected through the current 5-day forecast window.
weather_observation.rainfall: Any heavy rainfall threat for Wilmington, NC would be beyond the 5-day forecast window and is currently low confidence.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None identified for port operations during the current 5-day outlook.
